segments.text: How many places have you worked altogether ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me the general description of your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am in charge of the trading department . I'm handling invoices , shipping bills and computing freight costs , that's most of the documentation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time do you go to work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must be there no later than 9:00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time does the office close ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I quit work whenever I get finished , usually about six o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does your work involve a lot of paper filling and typing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , the secretary does this . It's not part of my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you decide to change your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am working in a small company where further promotion is impossible , so I decided to change my job . I'd like to find a job which is more challenging .
segments.speaker: S2
